mapper.select: SELECT task.id, task.name, task.publish, topicId, topic.name as topicName, DATE_FORMAT(beginTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') FROM task INNER JOIN topic ON task.topicId = topic.id WHERE topic.lessonId = #{lessonId} AND topic.ownerId = #{id}

SELECT task.id, task.name, topic.name, DATE_FORMAT(beginTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') FROM task INNER JOIN topic ON task.topicId = topic.id INNER JOIN topicmember ON topicmember.topicId = topic.id WHERE topic.lessonId = #{lessonId} AND topicmember.memberId = #{id} AND task.publish=true
